channel.title: Client Handler: Accpeted From
channel.description:
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22887 ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22887 ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22897 ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22897
Alright so I was port forwarding, After I finished I wanted to check and make sure that I port forwarded right. When I went to login, after I have attempted a few other tries, My run.bat sent me the message above.
Also Yes I have tested this on another server to make sure that it wasn't the server. Another thing, I am able to connect throught localhost (127.0.0.1). [b]PLEASE DO NOT POST SOMETHING LIKE "Use Hamachi"... If I wanted to use hamachi then I wouldn't have even posted this thread![/b]

item.title: Client Handler: Accpeted From
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22887
ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22887
ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22897
ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)22897

Alright so I was port forwarding, After I finished I wanted to check and make sure that I port forwarded right. When I went to login, after I have attempted a few other tries, My run.bat sent me the message above.

Also Yes I have tested this on another server to make sure that it wasn’t the server. Another thing, I am able to connect throught localhost (127.0.0.1).
PLEASE DO NOT POST SOMETHING LIKE “Use Hamachi”… If I wanted to use hamachi then I wouldn’t have even posted this thread!

Read full topic
